Class AccountManagementService

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(User user, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password
      Parameters:
      user - User whose password needs to be updated
      newPassword - New password to set
      Returns:
      true if password was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String nric, String newPassword)
      Resets password for a user identified by NRIC
      Parameters:
      nric - NRIC of the user
      newPassword - New password to set
      Returns:
      true if password was reset successfully, false otherwise
